content: Draft a romantic ballad about two lovers separated by distance. The lyrics should convey longing, commitment, and unwavering love.

(Title: Love Across Miles)

(Verse 1)
In the quiet of the night, under the same old moon,
I think of you, my love, though miles keep us apart.
The stars above seem to whisper your name,
And in the darkness, your laughter echoes, so near, yet so far.

(Chorus)
Love across miles, through time and space,
My heart beats for you, in every place.
Though distance may try to sever our ties,
My love for you grows stronger with each passing day.

(Verse 2)
I trace your face in the clouds, dream of your touch in the breeze,
Every sunset reminds me of the promise we made.
To love each other, no matter where life may lead,
Our hearts will remain connected, a bond that cannot be broken.

(Chorus)
Love across miles, through time and space,
My heart beats for you, in every place.
Though distance may try to sever our ties,
My love for you grows stronger with each passing day.

(Bridge)
Letters and calls are bridges we build,
To cross the oceans that separate us.
Each word, each smile, a testament to our love,
That time and space can't diminish or undo.

(Verse 3)
I hold onto memories like precious gems,
Each one a reminder of the love we share.
Through laughter and tears, through joy and pain,
Our love endures, a flame that burns bright and stays.

(Chorus)
Love across miles, through time and space,
My heart beats for you, in every place.
Though distance may try to sever our ties,
My love for you grows stronger with each passing day.

(Outro)
So here's to us, lovers apart but never alone,
With every mile between us, our love only grows.
Until the day we're together again, hand in hand,
Know that my heart is with you, across this vast land.

**End of Song**
